Detailed Description

template<class VoxelT, class MomentT>
class ScaledGeometricalMoments< VoxelT, MomentT >

Class for computing the scaled, pre-integrated geometrical moments. These tricks are needed to make the computation numerically stable. See the paper for more details.
Parameters:
VoxelT type of the voxel values
MomentT type of the moments -- recommended to be double
